question: Organisms have many methods of surviving winter conditions. Which of the following is NOT an example of an organism adapting to survive the cold winter months?
candidate_answers: (A) Robins fly from Michigan to Georgia in the fall. (B) Chameleons change color to match their surroundings. (C) White-tailed deer grow longer hair that is hollow inside. (D) Carp settle on the bottom of a pond and cover themselves with mud.
answer: Chameleons change color to match their surroundings.
label: B
